meta.name: Ultimate Supercar
meta.description: Today's high-end high-performance Supercars are an amazing combination of art and science. Super Car Build finds out how they do it and goes behind the scenes at some of the most legendary automotive marques to discover the hidden engineering secrets and keys to each machine's success.

videos.title: Keys to the Future
videos.overview: Highlights from the series examining the future of supercars, as established brand Honda and newcomer Rimac pave the way for innovative new technologies.

videos.title: Aston Martin DBS Superleggera
videos.overview: Aston Martin is an automotive independent that still lives; the brand needs to replace their halo machine, the DBS Superleggera.

videos.title: Ferrari Portofino
videos.overview: It is a brand forged from speed and made glorious on the track. Now Ferrari's most popular model and all-time best-selling machine must be replaced.

videos.title: Bentley Continental GT
videos.overview: It is a favourite of rappers, superstar athletes, millionaires, and billionaires - The Bentley Continental GT. For the past fifteen years the Conti has been the most successful high-end luxury grand tourer ever built.

videos.title: Lamborghini Aventador SVJ
videos.overview: Lamborghini reimagines its top supercar with the loudest, brashest and boldest design to come from the house of the raging bull.

videos.title: Pagani Huayra Roadster
videos.overview: It is a beautiful sculpture and an automotive masterpiece. A machine built for high-performance excess and defeat the basic laws of physics, the Pagani Huayra Roadster.

videos.title: Porsche Taycan
videos.overview: Porsche races the clock and its competitors to introduce its first fully electric vehicle.

videos.title: McLaren Artura
videos.overview: To forge a more environmentally friendly era for the marque, the McLaren team creates their first production hybrid.

videos.title: Bugatti Rimac Nevera
videos.overview: Croatian newcomer Mate Rimac aims to alter the electric vehicle landscape with a 1,914 horsepower $2-million hypercar called the Nevera.

videos.title: Maserati MC20
videos.overview: The Italian-made Maserati MC20, which boasts that it provides its owners with 'the ultimate driving experience'.

videos.title: Lotus Evija
videos.overview: Can British automaker Lotus overtake established sports car brands when they release the UK's first Â£2million 2000 horsepower all-electric supercar?

videos.title: Ferrari
videos.overview: Ferrari creates a new hybrid and their first production V6 engine in an attempt to redefine this famous supercar brand for a greener era.

videos.title: Honda NSX
videos.overview: Years before its rivals consider going green, Honda jumps into the hybrid game and reimagines their most celebrated sports car.

videos.title: A Tale of Two Legends
videos.overview: Special episode exploring the rivalry between Ferrari and Maserati as they race towards an electric future.

videos.title: Reimagining Electric
videos.overview: Highlights of the series, considering the post-fossil fuels future of supercars. With Europe poised to end the sale of fossil fuel-based cars, brands must change with the times.
